name: Flip Car Racing Challenge
description:
FLIP RACING CHALLENGE - The Ultimate Challenge is a free racing game with awesome Cars , thrilling graphic designs, rocking musical score, and beautiful game scenes.

FLIP RACING CHALLENGE has been designed for people of all ages and is especially optimized for iPhone 7, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus and iPhone 5S.

This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your driving skills of a FLIP RACING CHALLENGE.
